title: riot fix graves

replies.body:
F**k that BS, classic LOL players 
"Just get better", "its all your fault", "get better"
I have also played 10 games today and haven't seen one that Graves was not picked.
Or one that his side did not win. Jesus they nerfed Darius because he came up too much in Champs, will 10/10 picks and wins doesn't lie. 
Nerf him and nerf him now.....and Yas please nerf Yas too. Its time riot do it!

and Talon12 the answer is not learn to play against him..... it is play as him.

have just played two games. one as a direct support against him. I have to say just wow!!!!

I really cant believe they released him like this... its going to take a lot of practice for people not platinum to learn his skills and how to dodge.

Further to this his early push is just way to hard... and unless you have a jungler that can camp you, you will loose ground from wave one.

His tank is definitely deceptive at mid-late game, making him just ridiculously tanky.... more so then most juggernaughts!
why ty I'm glad 1 player agrees with me

so what you are saying is cos he was realest from pbe he is fine have you forgotten about {{champion:41}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:82}} {{champion:72}} pro players sed that these champs were too op wen on the pbe and riot did not care
